pageProduct.name: Rosken Skin Repair Intensive Moisture Body Lotion 400ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Rosken Intensive Moisture Body Lotion is a nourishing, moisture boosting formula specifically formulated for dry to very dry skin.

Rosken Intensive Moisture Body Lotion is a nourishing, moisture boosting body lotion specifically formulated for dry to very dry skin. The moisture boosting formula helps to increase skin moisture levels and lock in moisture from the first application, doubling moisture levels in just four days.

Rosken Intensive Moisture Body Lotion helps to:
- Provide instant & long-lasting moisture to the skin.
- Significantly increase the skin moisture levels over time.
- Enhance the skin's natural protective layer.

Size: 400mL

Ingredients

Glycerin, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil,Dimethicone, Mineral Oil (Paraffinum Liquidum), Water (Aqua), Cetearyl Alcohol, , Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Cetearyl Sulfate, BHT, Disodium EDTA, Methylparaben, Imidazolidinyl Urea, Propylparaben, Fragrance (Parfum), Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Benzyl Salicylate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene.

Directions

Use daily for great looking skin that feels beautifully soft and smooth.
For external use only.
